articles.title: [Watch] Shubman Gill Bowled Over By Gujarat Titans Fangirl's Cuteness During GT Vs DC - OneCricket
articles.description: Gujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill seemingly bowled over by a fangirl at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad during match number 32 of the IPL 2024 season.
